mapper.select: select * from champion order by name
select nvl(round(max((select pickcount from champion where championid=#{championid}))/(count(matchid)/2)*100),0) from teaminfo
select nvl(round(max((select bancount from champion where championid=#{championid}))/(count(matchid)/2)*100),0) from teaminfo

select max((select count(championid) from champion))maxcount ,count(matchid)/2 matchCount,max((select bancount from champion where championid=#{championid})) banCount,max((select pickcount from champion where championid=#{championid})) pickCount,max((select wincount from champion where championid=#{championid})) winCount from teaminfo
select aa.rank rank,aa.name name from ( select pickcount,name, championid,rank() over ( order by pickcount desc)rank from champion )aa where championid=#{championid}

select b.* from ( ( select a.championid,a.name,round(a.bancount/a.co/4*100)per ,ROW_NUMBER() over (order by round(a.bancount/a.co/4*100) desc)banrank from ( ( select champion.championid,champion.bancount,champion.name,count(teaminfo.matchid)co from teaminfo inner join teammemberinfo on teaminfo.matchid=teammemberinfo.matchid inner join champion on teammemberinfo.championid=champion.championid group by champion.name,champion.bancount,champion.championid))a))b where b.championid=#{championid}

select aa.* from( (select name,championid, round(nvl((wincount)/decode(pickcount,0,null,pickcount),0)*100)winrank,ROW_NUMBER() over(order by round(nvl((wincount*100)/decode(pickcount,0,null,pickcount),0)) desc,wincount desc)rank from champion)) aa where championid=#{championid}

select cc.*,ROW_number() over(order by cc.pickper desc)rank from ( select distinct bb.name,bb.pickper,bb.championid,bb.picture,bb.pickcount from( select round((pickcount)/(select count(matchid) from matchinfo)*100)pickper ,name,champion.championid,champion.picture,champion.pickcount from teammemberinfo inner join champion on champion.championid=teammemberinfo.championid where champion.bancount>3)bb)cc

select a.spell1,a.spell2,nvl(a.item1,2138)item1 ,nvl(a.item2,2138)item2 ,nvl(a.item3,2138)item3 from( (select spell2,spell1,item1,item2, item3, rank() over (order by item1 desc) from teammemberinfo inner join champion on champion.championid=teammemberinfo.championid where champion.championid=#{championid} group by item1,item2,item3,spell1,spell2)a) where rownum < 60

select cc.*,ROW_number() over(order by cc.banper desc)rank from ( select distinct bb.name,bb.banPer,bb.championid,bb.picture,bb.bancount from( select round((bancount/2)/(select count(matchid) from matchinfo)*100)banPer ,name,champion.championid,champion.picture,champion.bancount from teammemberinfo inner join champion on champion.championid=teammemberinfo.championid where champion.bancount>3)bb)cc

select aa.* from( (select picture,name,championid, round(nvl((wincount)/decode(pickcount,0,null,pickcount),0)*100)winrank, ROW_NUMber() over(order by round(nvl((wincount*100)/decode(pickcount,0,null,pickcount),0)) desc,wincount desc)rank from champion where pickcount>3)) aa
